reference.title: Adding Java libraries to the classpath
reference.shortdesc: If your Ant or XSLT extensions require additional Java libraries in the classpath, you can add them to the global Ant classpath with the following feature.

dlentry.dd: Add Java libraries to DITA-OT classpath.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following plug-in adds the compiled Java code from myJavaLibrary.jar into the global Ant classpath. XSLT or Ant code can then make use of the added code.
